meanings.sent1: The nephelinic rock had a unique texture.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the nephelinic properties of the mineral.
meanings.sent3: The nephelinic gem sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent5: The nephelinic crystal glowed with an otherworldly light.

meanings.definition: Resembling nepheline in composition or properties.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a nephelinic painting with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: The new material had a nephelinic appearance.
meanings.sent3: The nephelinic clouds in the sky looked like cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a nephelinic quality that was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The landscape was bathed in a nephelinic glow as the sun set.
